titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall on the 29th of May, 1694, being the anniversary of King Charles II, his birth and restauration by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Sarum's sermon before the Queen on the 29th of May, 1694.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
